Yellow Fever Huts - Camp Columbia Post Hospital, Quemados

A
Yellow Fever Huts Camp Columbia Post Hospital
Quemados (Havana) Cuba
1900-1901
For numberings
see p51 Gen. Truby's book
also see p160 for names of members of the Board of Havana Yellow Fever Experts
Probably these are the men visiting with the army Yellow Fever Board
I think #1 may be Mr. Lambert at Y.F huts
Is figure #3 - 7- or 8 Dr Reed? He wore a derby.
Who is before #9 with the high silk hat(?)
